name: 3dFFT
author: AFNI Team
description: Performs the FFT of the input dataset in 3 directions (x, y, z) and produces the output dataset.

inputs.description: Outputs the magnitude of the FFT (default)
inputs.name: Magnitude of FFT flag

inputs.description: Outputs the phase of the FFT (-PI..PI)
inputs.name: Phase of FFT flag

inputs.description: Does the inverse FFT instead of the forward FFT
inputs.name: Inverse FFT flag

inputs.description: Use FFT of length 'xx' in the x-direction
inputs.name: FFT length in x-direction

inputs.description: Use FFT of length 'yy' in the y-direction
inputs.name: FFT length in y-direction

inputs.description: Use FFT of length 'zz' in the z-direction
inputs.name: FFT length in z-direction

inputs.description: Alternate signs of input data before FFT to bring zero frequency from edge of FFT-space to center of grid for cosmetic purposes.
inputs.name: Alternate input signs flag

inputs.description: Alternate signs of output data after FFT. Use '-altOUT' with '-altIN' on the forward transform to get the signs of the recovered image correct.
inputs.name: Alternate output signs flag

inputs.description: Read the input dataset from specified file instead of from the last argument on the command line.
inputs.name: Input file

inputs.description: Use specified prefix for the output dataset.
inputs.name: Output prefix
